name: FinalB Geometry dash private server
description:
Jump and fly your way through danger in this rhythm-based action platformer!

Prepare for a near impossible challenge in the world of FinalB. Push your skills to the limit as you jump, fly and flip your way through dangerous passages and spiky obstacles.

Game Features
  • Rhythm-based Action Platforming!
  • Lots of levels with unique soundtracks!
  • Build and share your own levels using the level editor!
  • Thousands of high quality user generated levels!
  • Unlock new icons and colors to customize your character!
  • Fly rockets, flip gravity and much more!
  • Use practice mode to sharpen your skills!
  • Lots of achievements and rewards!
  • Challenge yourself with the near impossible!
  • Premium users can interact with the community
Premium Features
  • Level creation
  • Commenting
  • Rating levels
  • Viewable profile
Use-full Links
  • Re-upload a level from Geometry Dash
  • Add  a new song
How do I buy a premium account?
  1. Click the yellow Download Now button on the downloads section of the page.
  2. A menu should pop-up, under the price text bar, in the included files list , click on Premium account key at $1.10 USD
  3. Pay the premium account either with PayPal or Card
  4. You can now download the premium key on the page you will be redirected to.
Q & A

Q: Why do I have to pay to create an account?

A:  Making accounts paid, we ensure no spam or bad experience within the community. 

Q:  Can I share my account key with my friends?

A:   No, you're not allowed to share your account key with anyone, if we find out you did, you will be permanently ip banned and your key will be deactivated.

Q:  Do you make profit from this?

A:  No, as stated above, we are non-profit and use the money to pay for servers.

Q:  Do you have custom assets, like icons?

A:  Yes, we have custom icons, and, you get all of them unlocked!

Disclaimer: to create levels, rate and comment, you need to have a premium account.

This is just a private for the Geometry Dash game, all credits for the game to RobTop, you can find the original game here. We are also non-profit , all money goes into our servers
